tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_certifications_audits (
    certification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    certification_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_certifications (
  certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  certification_date DATE NOT NULL,
  owner_id UUID NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_owner FOREIGN KEY (owner_id) REFERENCES users (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE audits (
  audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  audit_result VARCHAR(50),
  certification_id UUID NOT NULL,
  CONSTRAINT fk_certification FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES compliance_certifications (certification_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_certifications (
    certification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name TEXT,
    certification_type TEXT,
    issuing_organization TEXT,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE audit_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    report_name TEXT,
    report_type TEXT,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name TEXT,
    audit_findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (
    assessment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_name TEXT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_by TEXT,
    risk_level INT,
    recommendations TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_certifications(
  certification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  certification_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  certification_agency VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  certification_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE audit_reports(
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_documents(
  document_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  upload_date DATE,
  document_content BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment(
  assessment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_date DATE,
  assessment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  risk_level VARCHAR(20),
  recommendation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_certifications (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    certification_name VARCHAR(255),
    certification_date DATE,
    organization_name VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_type VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE audits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255),
    audit_type VARCHAR(100),
    result VARCHAR(50),
    certification_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES compliance_certifications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255),
    document_type VARCHAR(100),
    upload_date DATE,
    certification_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES compliance_certifications(id)
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_date DATE,
    risk_level VARCHAR(50),
    implications TEXT,
    certification_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (certification_id) REFERENCES compliance_certifications(id)
);
